search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Flodesk (flodesk.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Flodesk can be found at: [https://flodesk.com/pricing](https://flodesk.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

E-COMMERCE

Upsells + bonus offers

Discount codes

Online payments

Instant deliveries

Flat rate
---------

With Flodesk, you don't have to upgrade your plan and pay more every time your business grows. Enjoy a flat rate and unlimited usage, forever.

No platform fee
---------------

Most checkout tools take 10-20% of your revenue in platform fees. With Flodesk, keep your hard earned money—only pay the Stripe processing fee.

Unlimited access
----------------

Do business on your timeline, not ours. Use all of the Flodesk tools for as long as you need, only pay when you’re ready to publish.

Compare pricing and features for our unlimited, flat-rate plans, starting at just $35/month. You'll never be penalized for growing your list.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Flodesk offers flat-rate pricing with unlimited usage, focusing on email marketing and e-commerce tools.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Free forever tier with basic features.
Flat rate for unlimited email marketing features.
Flat rate for unlimited e-commerce features.

additional_fees.fee_description: Standard Stripe processing fee applies for payment processing.
